name: Big Shooty: The 2D Arcade Space Shooter
name_original: Big Shooty: The 2D Arcade Space Shooter
description:
This game is taking inspiration from older generations of games, it being 2D in nature it keeps the concept light and simple, your aim is to destroy as many enemies as you can and survive as long as you can and gain points in the mean time.

Lead Programmer - Oscar Duffield

Technical and Engine Work - Oscar Duffield

Sounds Effects - Yaseen Amijee

Character Art - Kody Ebanks

Art and VFX - Edward Moore, Michael Moloney

Background Art - Michael Moloney

Controls:

Right Mouse Button - Fire

"A" - Move Left 

"D" - Move Right 

Alt F4 - Quit
